full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement
================================

### Procurement Opportunity

The Government of Canada invites qualified bidders to participate in a procurement opportunity for the supply of Hard Body Armour, General Duty and Carrier, Hard Body Armour. The estimated quantity for this opportunity is:

* 19,000 sets of General Duty Hard Body Armour
* 38,000 Carrier, Hard Body Armour

The procurement will be conducted in two phases and will be open to all bidders, including those from non-Canadian sources.

### Procurement Details

* **Notice Number:** M7594-220138/C
* **Contracting Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services
* **End User:** Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
* **Location:** Ottawa, Ontario
* **Duration:** The Standing Offer will be valid for a period of five (5) years from the date of issuance.

### Technical Requirements

The tender requires compliance with RCMP Specification No: G.S. 1045-330 for General Duty Hard Body Armour and RCMP Specification No: G.S. 1045-350 for Carrier, Hard Body Armour.

### Procurement Method

This procurement will be conducted through an open bidding process, with the lowest cost-per-point being the selection criteria.

### Trade Agreements

The procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Contact Information

For further information, please contact:

* Nathalie Ferron (SPAC/PSPC) - nathalie.ferron@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice URL

The full notice can be accessed at: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15990019?extsite=MTU5OTAwMTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15990019?extsite=MTU5OTAwMTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Tender Closing Date

The tender closing date is 2023-04-27T14:00:00. Please note that this opportunity is expired.
